comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
MSI creation is failing. Investigating..

```
VERBOSE: C:\build\work\eca3d12b\wix3\src\ext\UIExtension\wixlib\LicenseAgreementDlg.wxs(32) : error LGHT0311 : A string was provided with characters that are not available in the specified database 
code page '1252'. Either change these characters to ones that exist in the database's code page, or update the database's code page by modifying one of the following attributes: Product/@Codepage, M
odule/@Codepage, Patch/@Codepage, PatchCreation/@Codepage, or WixLocalization/@Codepage.

```

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body: We are good to go. All encoding issues fixed. Verified that MSI can render the new license.
